verbose_text: It was noted that in relation to 1.2 mug anthocyanin g -1 FW in control plants, the anthocyanin content in 7-day-old plants of Vigna radiata increased to 13.75 mug g -1 FW with the Cr (VI) metal treatment.
evidence: FW in control plants, the anthocyanin content in 7-day-old plants of Vigna radiata increased to 13.75 mug g -1  FW with the Cr
